name: Awesome Hardware - Faceoff (unofficial)
description:
Awesome Hardware - Faceoff (unofficial)                                                 Get to the sushi restaurant! Last one there has to pay. This is the take home version of the popular tech-news show Awesome Hardware's, "Faceoff" segment. See what hilarity and hijinks YouTubers Paul of Paul's Hardware and Kyle of Bitwit get into. This is less a game and more interactive fan art of some of the techtubers that I follow. I've been following Paul and Kyle since they were at Newegg, as they are entertaining, informative and make a great duo. This is my first game created in Unity. It requires 2 people to play, as the Awesome Hardware podcast is a two person operation. 10-key keyboard is needed. - John. Awesome Hardware: Faceoff, featuring: Paul of Paul's Hardware - www.youtube.com/user/paulshardware Kyle of Bitwit - www.youtube.com/user/awesomesaucenews Other youtubers making cameo appearances: Jay of JayzTwoCents - www.youtube.com/user/jayztwocents Logan of Tek Syndicate - www.youtube.com/user/razethew0rld Linus of Linus Tech Tips -  www.youtube.com/user/linustechtips Luke of Floatplane - www.linustechtips.com "Tiny" Tom Logan aka TTL of OC3D - www.youtube.com/user/timetolivecustoms Dmitry of Hardware Canucks - www.youtube.com/user/hardwarecanucks Wendell of Level1 Techs - www.youtube.com/user/teksyndicate Steve of Gamers Nexus - www.youtube.com/user/gamersnexus Gordon of PCWorld Videos - www.youtube.com/user/pcworldvideos "Joker" of Joker Productions - www.youtube.com/user/jerzybakes420 Bryan of Tech YES City - www.youtube.com/user/bryaneasy Fractal Josh of Fractal Design - www.youtube.com/user/fractaldesignna Ryan, Allyn, Josh & Jeremy of PC Perspective - www.youtube.com/user/pcper

Concept, Coding, Character Art, Building & Level Design: John Edgett

Open sourced art assets used:

Trees  - C. Nilsson - www.opengameart.org/users/cnilsson; recolored by William. Thompsonj - www.opengameart.org/users/williamthompsonj;

Grass - Silver IV (Ivan Voirol) - www.opengameart.org/users/silver-iv

City Background Repetitive 3 - Alucard - www.opengameart.org/users/alucard

2D City Tileset - Damian Gasinski aka Gassasin -  www.opengameart.org/users/gassasin

Music:

"Jump and Run (8-bit)" - Bart Kelsey www.opengameart.org/users/bart

Sound Effects:

"Jump" - Bart Kelsey www.opengameart.org/users/bart

Kyle's dialog - www.youtube.com/user/awesomesaucenews - "Epic live stream FAIL by yours truly" - September 13, 2017

Paul's dialog - www.youtube.com/user/paulshardware - "Awesome Hardware #0065-A: Radeon RX 460 & 470 Announced, GTX 1060 Rumors" - June 14, 2016.
